newsitem.title: MEXICO: MEXICO CATTLE REPORT, FEEDER EXPORT PRICE -USDA.
newsitem.headline: MEXICO CATTLE REPORT, FEEDER EXPORT PRICE -USDA.

text.p: USDA reported Friday that around 2,450 head were exported into the United States at three crossing points Thursday.
Through Presidio, Texas, around 2,000 head were sold at firm to 1 cent/lb higher prices compared to Wednesday. "Trade active, demand good," USDA said.
Prices for head weighing 300-400 lb were 97-107 cents/lb and for 400-500 lb head at 87-97 cents/lb.
Through Del Rio, Texas, around 150 head were sold and through Nogalkes, Arizona, another 300 head were exported. At both not enough sales were made to establish quote prices.
((--Chris Aspin, Mexico City newsroom +525 7289530)) E-mail at chris.aspin@reuters.com
